name: login-form
author: Stitipragyanbarik
preview: Modern Login Form with Validation and Google Sign-In

props.name: onSubmit
props.description: Callback function called when the form is submitted with valid data

props.name: onGoogleSignIn
props.description: Callback function called when Google Sign-In button is clicked

props.name: onForgotPassword
props.description: Callback function called when Forgot Password link is clicked

props.name: onSignUp
props.description: Callback function called when Sign Up link is clicked

props.name: className
props.description: Additional CSS classes for custom styling
